name: Tank in the City
description:
Tank in the City | by William Dorsey

This is a game made for my Game Production class at UCF. It is about a tank that has to figure out how to make it through a city located in a valley in order to get to an important battle.

This is my first attempt at Bitsy and a narrative game in general. The game is supposed to be light-hearted and silly, with some humor thrown in.

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/kq95gu2e42pg5qo/tank_in_the_city_FINAL.zip?dl=1
